faqs.question: What is the typical price range if I want to buy house in Sector 84 Gurgaon

For high-quality builder floors (3BHK to 4BHK), prices typically start around 90 Lakhs and can extend up to 2 Crores, depending on amenities and floor level. For independent houses and luxury villas, the starting investment is generally above 3.5 Crores. Market prices are competitive yet appreciating rapidly due to surrounding infrastructure improvements like the Dwarka Expressway, making it a strong value proposition.
